title: Importance of Intention
bangla_arabic: Actions are judged by intentions
meaning: A person will get the reward according to his intention.

title: Result of Truthfulness
bangla_arabic: Truthfulness leads to righteousness

title: Importance of Purity
bangla_arabic: Purity is half of faith
meaning: Being clean is an essential part of faith.

title: Identity of a Believer
bangla_arabic: A believer is like a building to another believer

title: Religion is Easy
bangla_arabic: Religion is easy
meaning: One should not overburden themselves in religion.

title: Speak Good or Remain Silent
bangla_arabic: Say good or remain silent

title: Taste of Faith
arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لِأَخِيهِ
bangla_arabic: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself
meaning: True faith includes love for others.

title: Smile is Charity
bangla_arabic: Your smile to your brother is charity

title: Power of Charity
bangla_arabic: Charity extinguishes sins

title: Reward of Patience
arabic: وَمَا أُعْطِيَ أَحَدٌ عَطَاءً خَيْرًا مِنَ الصَّبْرِ
bangla_arabic: No one is given a better gift than patience
meaning: Patience is a great strength of a believer.

title: Control of Anger
bangla_arabic: Do not get angry

title: Being Trustworthy
bangla_arabic: Signs of a hypocrite include betrayal

title: Rights of Neighbors
bangla_arabic: The neighbor has the most right
meaning: Good behavior to neighbors is obligatory.

title: Importance of Salah
bangla_arabic: Islam is built on five pillars
meaning: Prayer is a key pillar of Islam.

title: Reality of the World
bangla_arabic: Be in this world as if you are a traveler

title: Guarding the Tongue
bangla_arabic: Guard your tongue
meaning: Most sins occur because of the tongue.

title: Virtue of Knowledge
bangla_arabic: Seeking knowledge is obligatory
meaning: It is required for every Muslim.

title: Reward of Mercy
bangla_arabic: The Merciful are shown mercy by the Most Merciful

title: Status of a Muslim
bangla_arabic: A Muslim is a brother to another Muslim

title: Importance of Repentance
arabic: التَّائِبُ مِنَ الذَّنْبِ كَمَنْ لَا ذَنْبَ لَهُ
bangla_arabic: Whoever repents is like one free from sin
